title: (x) "What does possession mean to you?" bold serif beauty - Perpetua {Richard Hards}
content:
Came across this today in a book from the 60s. Looks familiar but I can’t pinn it down...  
Anyone? Thanks in advance!

comments.content: yep, but what happened on the letter spacing between the initial W and h?
